titleStmt.title: A sober whisper, concerning the evil of things present, and the good of things to come. By Tho. Narjenn
titleStmt.author: Tanner, Thomas, 1630-1682, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Thomas Tanner, i.e. Tho. Narjenn?.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
